section.name: Groups Configuration
section.p: The groups are stored in the repository as childeren of the node /hippo:configuration/hippo:groups. The members of the group are stored in the nulti valued property hippo:members A groups node has the following configuration:
The groups configuration is used by the HippoLoginModule.

subsection.name: hippo:group
subsection.source: <sv:node sv:name="mygroup"> <sv:property sv:name="jcr:primaryType" sv:type="Name"> <sv:value>hippo:group</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:members" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>demo</sv:value> <sv:value>user1</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:description" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>My Own Group</sv:value> </sv:property> </sv:node>

tr.td: the username of the user that is member of the group. Multiple hippo:members can be set with each containing one username.
